title: All Ball - NBA Draft , Team USA Struggles -- Guest Maurice Clarett on Overnight Stardom, Miami Title Game, Tressel
itunes:title: All Ball - NBA Draft , Team USA Struggles -- Guest Maurice Clarett on Overnight Stardom, Miami Title Game, Tressel
description:
In this episode, Doug breaks down some of the top NBA Draft prospects and if Cade Cunningham is a lock at #1, and Team USA's losing ways carrying over into the Olympics. His guest is former Ohio State standout running back and national champion Maurice Clarett, who looks back at his Youngstown upbringing, the surprising way he ended up at Ohio State, how he went from 4th string to 1st string in one day, his memories of the 2003 national title run, the championship game against a legendary Miami team, and the NCAA Investigation that spelled the end of his Buckeye days. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
